name: Shaman Academy
description:
Test your abilities in combat and magic on Shaman Academy.

Each player draws 3 cards on game start, then you can play a different card per turn. The goal is to knock-out your opponent, whatever it takes!

Types of Cards
  • Battle Cards - Used to deal damage to your opponent. Can be a Rock, Paper or Scissors type card. When the type Battle Card you played beats your opponent, he will not be able to play his Battle Card.
  • Spell Cards - Used to cast spells for different effects. Some spells costs mana and some will give mana. Spells cards will give you a "Spell Defend" for protection from enemy attacks during the turn they are played.
Spirits

If you have enough mana, you can use your Spirit Spell Cards to summon your Spirit. While you have a spirit, the damage you deal increases.

Possess

If you currently have a Spirit and have enough mana, you can use your Possess Spell Cards to possess with your Spirit. When possessed, you transform, gaining more damage and health. Giving you more advantage against your opponent.

Some Tips
  • Most attacks causes unbalance to your enemy. When a player is unbalanced 5 times, he will be stunned and miss a turn.
  • Attacking a defending enemy will cause their guard to slowly break. When their guard is broken, their defend will be useless for 3 turns.
